titleStmt.title: Mr. Lillies nevv prophesie of a general peace Together with the uniting of all different persuasions of religion, in principles of love and mutual condiscention. To which is added a strange and wonderful prophesie lately discovered in Holland, relating to the grand affairs of our present age. Faithfully translated & communicated from the original by a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Lilly, William, 1602-1681.

titleStmt.title: Mr. Lillies nevv prophesie of a general peace Together with the uniting of all different persuasions of religion, in principles of love and mutual condiscention. To which is added a strange and wonderful prophesie lately discovered in Holland, relating to the grand affairs of our present age. Faithfully translated & communicated from the original by a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Lilly, William, 1602-1681.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by Wing.
'A person of quality' is not identified.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
